response.text: Hello! How can I help you?
UPH Compound, National Highway, Sto. Nino, City of Binan, Laguna
We're closed on Sundays. Our hours on weekdays and Saturdays are from 8am to 5pm.
PhD Philosophy Major in Educational Management
For more inquiries kindly email admission.college@uphsl.edu.ph
Dr. Jose G. Tamayo and Dr. Josefina Laperal Tamayo
University of Perpetual Help System Laguna
Dr./BGen. Antonio Laperal Tamayo, GSC, FPCHA, Ph.D. - Chairman of the Board, CEO and President
Ma. Theresa T. Salazar, MD, MS
Arcadio L. Tamayo, MD, PhD - Chancellor and EVP
Maj. Rafael L. Tamayo, BSC, MBA
Marcia Ana L. Tamayo, BSC ARCH
Ma. Florencia T. Tampoya, MD FAAFP
Maj. Victor L. Tamayo, MD, MHA
Step 1- Secure list of admission requirements from SPS Office.
Step 2- Fill out Entrance Examinee Data Form and sign consent under Data Privacy Act.
Step 3- Pay entrance examination/locator number fee at Cashier.
Step 4- Present official receipt at SPS Office for entrance examination permit.
Step 5- Claim examination result/certificate of passing.
Step 6- Submit admission requirements for evaluation.
Step 7- Pay and claim enrollment kit at Cashier.
Step 8- Fill out Individual Inventory Form and Student Needs Assessment Survey.
Step 9- Undertake incomplete credentials if necessary.
Step 10- Receive Drug Test Monitoring Slip for Clinic notation.
Step 11- Sign notice for mandatory drug testing at Clinic.
Step 12- Fill out pre-enrollment form at Dean’s Office upon submission of Dean’s envelope.
Step 13- Pay assessed tuition and fees at Cashier.
Step 14- Present official receipt with assessed courses at Registrar’s Office for registration form.
Step 15- Present Registration Form and drug test monitoring slip at ITS Office for student ID issuance.
Step 1- Secure list of admission requirements from SPS Office.
Step 2- Submit copy of grades to Dean’s Office for course evaluation.
Step 3- Fill out Entrance Examinee Data Form and sign consent under Data Privacy Act at SPS Office.
Step 4- Pay entrance examination/locator number fee at Cashier.
Step 5- Present official receipt at SPS Office for entrance examination permit and claim examination result.
Step 6- Submit admission requirements for evaluation.
Step 7- Pay and claim enrollment kit at Cashier.
Step 8- Fill out Individual Inventory Form and Student Needs Assessment Survey.
Step 9- Undertake incomplete credentials if necessary and receive Drug Test Monitoring Slip for Clinic notation.
Step 10- Attend interview at Security Office.
Step 11- Submit Security Interview result form for issuance of Dean’s Copy of Student 201 at Admission Office.
Step 12- Fill out pre-enrollment form at Dean’s Office upon submission of Dean’s envelope.
Step 13- Pay assessed tuition and fees at Cashier and secure official receipt.
Step 14- Present official receipt with assessed courses at Registrar’s Office for registration form.
Step 15- Present Registration Form and drug test monitoring slip at ITS Office for student ID issuance.
You can visit http://gti-binan.dyndns.org:8339/ to view.
This is a chatbot that is programmed to respond to the user’s questions about University of Perpetual Help.
